definition: slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
therefore/consequently/thus/hence/thereupon/it follows that/where?/to change (into)/ancient unit of weight and money
to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
to ease (tension)/to alleviate/to moderate/to allay/to make more mild
to ease (tension)/to relax/to cause sth to relax/to alleviate/relaxed/easy and unhurried/leisurely/soothing/mild (slope)
to defer/to postpone/to put off/to retard/to slow sth down
buffer/to cushion/to adjust to sharp changes
to defer/to put off (until later)/to postpone
to brook no delay/to demand immediate action

sentences.english: Possess current estrangement, cushion exceed dynamical function and appropriative electric power measure.
sentences.chinese: 具有電流隔幅，緩啓動功能及專用的電力調整器。

sentences.english: Usually, there are densely distributed small instable rocks in a low-angled stratofabric rock slope.
sentences.chinese: 緩傾角層狀巖質邊坡是小危巖體出露的主要坡型之一。

sentences.english: In this way pollution can be slowed down.
sentences.chinese: 用這種辦法可以把污染緩降下來。

sentences.english: It soothed my black hole in the heart and in the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 它讓我心臟和胃部的黑洞得到紓緩。

sentences.english: It was a long time before he came to.
sentences.chinese: 過了好一陣他才緩過來。

sentences.english: Slow fault structure is commonly developed in every mining area or mining well in Longyong Coal Field.
sentences.chinese: 緩斷裂構造普遍發育於龍永煤田各個礦區或井田。

sentences.english: The timely rain revived the droughtstricken crops.
sentences.chinese: 這場及時雨使受旱的禾苗都緩過來了。

sentences.english: The deposits of Mine No. 712 belong to the moderately inclined ones.
sentences.chinese: 七一二礦屬緩傾斜鈾礦牀。

sentences.english: Conclusions The similarity factor is fit for evaluation of sustained or controlled release preparations.
sentences.chinese: 結論相似因子法適合於緩控釋製劑體外釋放的評價。

sentences.english: The ore deposit of Dazhuangzi Gold Mine is high grade gently dipping medium thick orebody.
sentences.chinese: 大莊子金礦礦體爲高品位緩傾斜中厚礦體。

sentences.english: I forget to file my taxes and now I have to pay the fine for being late.
sentences.chinese: 我忘了報稅，現在我得爲了遲繳而付罰緩。

sentences.english: They also need a shoe with extra cushioning to compensate for their high arches.
sentences.chinese: 他們還需要鞋提供額外緩衝來適應他們的高足弓。

sentences.english: And the way you would have laughed and talked fast or slow?
sentences.chinese: 還有你大笑的模樣，說話是急還是緩？

sentences.english: A sight glass provides ease in checking oil level.
sentences.chinese: 一視鏡提供紓緩在檢查油的水平。

sentences.english: His farther should thank Huan for his efforts in financing family members.
sentences.chinese: 緩做官賺錢資助家人，做父親的是應該心存感激之心。

sentences.english: In two or three more days, I noticed the pain was very much diminished.
sentences.chinese: 再經過兩三天，我感覺疼動已大幅紓緩。

definition: to ease (tension)/to alleviate/to moderate/to allay/to make more mild
to ease (tension)/to relax/to cause sth to relax/to alleviate/relaxed/easy and unhurried/leisurely/soothing/mild (slope)
to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
